sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-data-table
    :headers="headers"
    :items="templateList"
    sort-by="name"
    class="elevation-1"
    :items-per-page="5"
    :footer-props="{
      'items-per-page-text': '每页显示条数',
      pageText: '{0}-{1} of {2}',
      'items-per-page-all-text': 'all',
    }"
  >
    <template v-slot:top>
      <v-toolbar flat>
        <v-toolbar-title>权限管理</v-toolbar-title>

        <v-btn
          color="primary"
          dark
          class="mb-1 ml-4"
          v-bind="attrs"
          v-on="on"
          @click="editAuthority = true"
        >
          我的管理权限
        </v-btn>
        
       <v-snackbar
      v-model="caution"
      :timeout="timeout"
      :bottom="true"
      :width="240"
     
    
    >
     abcd

      <template v-slot:action="{ attrs }">
        <v-btn
          color="blue"
          text
          v-bind="attrs"
          @click="caution = false"
        >
          Close
        </v-btn>
      </template>
    </v-snackbar>

        <edit-authority
          :open="editAuthority"
          :template="template"
          @closeDialog="editAuthority = false"
          @onEditAuthorityTemplateResult="onEditAuthorityTemplateResult"
        />

        <!--删除Dialog-->
        <v-dialog v-model="dialogDelete" max-width="500px">
          <v-card>
            <v-card-title class="text-h5"
              >你确定要删除"{{ editedItem.name }}"权限吗？</v-card-title
            >
            <v-card-actions>
              <v-spacer></v-spacer>
              <v-btn color="blue darken-1" text @click="closeDelete"
                >取消</v-btn
              >
              <v-btn color="blue darken-1" text @click="deleteItemConfirm"
                >确定</v-btn
              >
              <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            </v-card-actions>
          </v-card>
        </v-dialog>
      </v-toolbar>
    </template>
    <template v-slot:[`item.oemList`]="{ item }">
     
        <v-chip
          v-for="(dept, index) in item.oemList"
          class="ma-2"
          :key="index"
          color="primary"
          text-color="white"
        >
          {{ dept.companyName}}
        </v-chip>  
    </template>
    <template v-slot:[`item.actions`]="{ item }">
      <v-icon small class="mr-2" @click="editItem(item)"> mdi-pencil </v-icon>
      <v-icon small @click="deleteItem(item)"> mdi-delete </v-icon>
    </template>
    <template v-slot:no-data>
      <v-btn color="primary" @click="initialize"> Reset </v-btn>
    </template>
  </v-data-table>
</template>

<script>
import { getAllPermission, getTemplateList,getDeptList } from "@/api/getData";

export default {
  name: "authorityManagement",
  components: {
    editAuthority: () => import("./editAuthority"),
  },

  mounted() {
    //fix me : 判断条件不要忘记了
    let resp = getTemplateList();
    this.templateList = resp.data;

    let desp = getDeptList();
    this.department = desp.data
  },

  data() {
    return {
      caution:true,
      dialog: false,
      dialogDelete: false,
      editAuthority: false,
      headers: [
        {
          text: "权限名称",
          align: "start",
          sortable: false,
          value: "templateName",
        },
        { text: "权限描述", value: "summary" },
        // { text: '包含权限', value: 'authority' },
        { text: "包含部门", value: "oemList" },
        { text: "发布时间", value: "publishTime" },
        { text: "操作", value: "actions", sortable: false },
      ],

      templateList: [],
      template:{},
      department:[],
      //======  分割线=======
      editedIndex: -1,
      editedItem: {
        name: "",
        description: "",
        authority: [],
        roles: "",
      },
      selection: [],
    };
  },

  //加载页面时设置添加和编辑标题
  computed: {
    formTitle() {
      return this.editedIndex === -1 ? "添加权限" : "编辑权限";
    },
    items() {
      return [
        {
          name: "Users",
          children: this.users,
        },
      ];
    },
  },

  //监视对话框
  watch: {
    editAuthority() {
      //编辑对话框已关闭。清理数据
      if(this.editAuthority === false) {
          this.template = {}
          // alert("result = "+result+" v "+v + "  "+h)
      }
    },

    dialog(val) {
      val || this.close();
    },
    dialogDelete(val) {
      val || this.closeDelete();
    },
  },

  //页面第一次加载时,调用初始化方法
  created() {
    
  },

  methods: {
    
    initialize() {
      getAllPermission({})
        .then((res) => {
          console.log("-------------");
          console.log(res.data);
          // res = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(res));
          // console.log(typeof(res.data));
        })
        .catch((res) => {
          console.log(res);
        });
    },

    //编辑权限
    editItem(item) {
      // this.editedIndex = this.desserts.indexOf(item);
      // this.editedItem = Object.assign({}, item);
      // this.selection = this.editedItem.authority;
      // this.dialog = true;
      //alert(JSON.stringify(item))

      //if (this.$refs.child) this.$refs.child.changeTree(this.editedItem.roles);
      this.template = item;
      this.editAuthority=true;
      
    },

    //删除一个权限
    deleteItem(item) {
      this.editedIndex = this.desserts.indexOf(item);
      this.editedItem = Object.assign({}, item);
      this.dialogDelete = true;
    },

    //确定删除
    deleteItemConfirm() {
      this.desserts.splice(this.editedIndex, 1);
      this.closeDelete();
    },

    //关闭添加编辑对话框
    close() {
      this.dialog = false;
      this.$nextTick(() => {
        this.editedItem = Object.assign({}, this.defaultItem);
        this.editedIndex = -1;
      });
    },

    //关闭删除对话框
    closeDelete() {
      this.dialogDelete = false;
      this.$nextTick(() => {
        this.editedItem = Object.assign({}, this.defaultItem);
        this.editedIndex = -1;
      });
    },

    //保存编辑和新增的记录
    save() {
      this.editedItem.authority = this.selection;
      if (this.editedIndex > -1) {
        Object.assign(this.desserts[this.editedIndex], this.editedItem);
      } else {
        this.desserts.push(this.editedItem);
      }
      this.selection = [];
      this.close();
    },

    //获得子组件的角色
    getRoles(sonRolesSelection) {
      let strTemp = [];
      sonRolesSelection.forEach(function (item) {
        strTemp.push(item.name);
      });
      this.editedItem.roles = strTemp.join(",");
    },

    //新增对话框默认是查看文章和查看回复。
    clearAddDialogAll() {
      this.selection = [
        { id: 14, name: "查看文章" },
        { id: 15, name: "查看回复" },
      ];
      this.editedItem.description =
        "只能看文章和回复，不能发布文章，未被分配权限模板的角色都自动使用此套权限";
      this.$refs.child.selection = [];
    },

    //set roles color
    getColor() {
      return "grey";
    },
    onEditAuthorityTemplateResult(result){
      console.log(result)
    }
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
</style>
